title: How to Show OneDrive in the Finder Favorites on a Mac

steps.title: Make sure OneDrive is set up on your Mac.
steps.content: Make sure OneDrive is set up on your Mac. You should have a OneDrive folder in your Applications folder. If you don't, launch OneDrive and select a save location.

steps.title: Locate the OneDrive app.
steps.content: Locate the OneDrive app. You'll need to use the Finder .

steps.title: Hold ⌘ Cmd and drag OneDrive to the sidebar.
steps.content: Hold ⌘ Cmd and drag OneDrive to the sidebar. If you're dragging the OneDrive folder rather than the app, you won't need to hold down any keys. This will add a shortcut to OneDrive onto the sidebar. [1] X Research source If you don't see a Favorites section, do the following: Click Finder . Click Settings . Click Sidebar . Select at least one item. To remove something from the sidebar, drag the item out of the sidebar until you see an x .
